content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah, thank you for coming to see the apartment. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am dependable and responsible, I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Can you offer me a competitive price?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Of course, I want to be fair to all potential tenants. Based on the size of the apartment, I am willing to offer a rental price of €600 per month. This is a fair price for a 25-square-meter apartment in a good location. Would you be interested in this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Can you lower the price? I am a student and I want to save as much as possible.

I would be willing to pay €550 per month if you can lower the price.

I understand that you have to be fair to all potential tenants, but I am a dependable and responsible person. I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

I am willing to negotiate with you. Let's find a mutually beneficial agreement.

Please let me know if there is anything else I can do to help.

Thank you for considering my offer.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Ryanah. I understand that you are a student and want to save as much as possible. Based on your proposal of €550 per month, I can lower the price to €550. This is a fair price for a 25-square-meter apartment in a good location. Would you be interested in this price?
name: Heinrich Heine
